.. _msn_bc_XENIUM:

Human breast cancer XENIUM
==========================

0. Download
+++++++++++++++++

`XENIUM dataset <https://10xgenomics.com/products/xenium-in-situ/human-breast-dataset-explorer>`_

1. Import images
+++++++++++++++++
  .. image:: _images/msn_BC_XENIUM_import_images.png
     :width: 100%
     
2. Add metadata
+++++++++++++++++
  .. image:: _images/msn_BC_XENIUM_add_channels.png
     :width: 100%
     
3. Segment cells
+++++++++++++++++
  .. image:: _images/msn_BC_XENIUM_seg.png
     :width: 100%
     
4. Cluster cells
+++++++++++++++++
  .. image:: _images/msn_BC_XENIUM_clust_pops.png
     :width: 100%
     
5. Extract neighbours
+++++++++++++++++
  .. image:: _images/msn_BC_XENIUM_neighbours.png
     :width: 100%
     
5. Extract regions
+++++++++++++++++
  .. image:: _images/msn_BC_XENIUM_clust_regions.png
     :width: 100%
     
7. Generate figure
+++++++++++++++++
